issue.title: [CF 738] Basic Functionality/Warlock Setup
issue.body:
Hi, I haven't used tmw since early cataclysm (stopped playing), and after a good 45 minutes of searching I can't find anything to help me setting up pretty basic stuff with the new layout/changes. In cataclysm, my layout was just DoT timer icons of the spell with a countdown, and was red when not applied to the target, buff/proc monitors, and spell/item/pot cooldown trackers. Currently, when trying to set these things up, the icon simple doesn't appear at all no matter how I tweak things. I also imported a string of basic warlock cooldowns but had the same problem of no icons showing after said spell has been cast on the target. I'm pretty lost and any info/tips/links would would be greatly appreciated. Affliction is pretty impossible without appropriate timers.


> Posted by CurseForge user Askloun | Imported from CurseForge issue #738 | Raw

comments.body:
Please post the export string of the icon(s) that you are having trouble with. To get an export string, open the icon editor, and click button labeled "Import/Export/Backup". Select the "To string" ... "Icon: #" option, and then press CTRL+C to copy it to your clipboard.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

No response received after 2+ weeks. Closing ticket.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
